overview: December 23rd, 2000 :: Pro Wrestling Noah presents The Great Voyage. In the wake of the great Exodus from All Japan Pro Wrestling the young upstart Pro Wrestling Noah promotion embarks on one of its' inaugural shows which took place in Tokyo at the Ariake Colosseum. The show marked third event held by the Pro Wrestling Noah and was considered the biggest show up to that point.  Matches include:  ⦁	Kenta Kobashi vs. Jun Akiyama  ⦁	Mitsuhara Misawa vs. Vader  ⦁	Shinya Hashimoto vs. Takao Omori  ⦁	Akira Taue vs. Yoshihiro Takayama  ⦁	Daisuke Ikeda & Yoshinari Ogawa vs. Akitoshi Saito & Masashi Aoyagi  ⦁	Tsuyoshi Kikuchi & KENTA vs. Scorpio & Kishin Kawabata  ⦁	Naomichi Marufuji & Tamon Honda vs. Kodo Fuyuki & Tetsuhiro Kuroda  ⦁	Kentaro Shiga, Yoshinobu Kanemaru & Takeshi Morishima vs. Masao Inoue, Takeshi Rikio & Takashi Sugiura  ⦁	Rusher Kimura, Mitsuo Momota & Makoto Hashi vs. Jun Izumida, Satoru Asako & Haruka Eigen
title: NOAH: Great Voyage
